verses.name: Psalms 30:1
verses.text: I will extol thee, O Lord; for thou hast lifted me up, and hast not made my foes to rejoice over me.

verses.name: Psalms 30:2
verses.text: O Lord my God, I cried unto thee, and thou hast healed me.

verses.name: Psalms 30:3
verses.text: O Lord, thou hast brought up my soul from the grave: thou hast kept me alive, that I should not go down to the pit.

verses.name: Psalms 30:4
verses.text: Sing unto the Lord, O ye saints of his, and give thanks at the remembrance of his holiness.

verses.name: Psalms 30:5
verses.text: For his anger endureth but a moment; in his favour is life: weeping may endure for a night, but joy cometh in the morning.

verses.name: Psalms 30:6
verses.text: And in my prosperity I said, I shall never be moved.

verses.name: Psalms 30:7
verses.text: Lord, by thy favour thou hast made my mountain to stand strong: thou didst hide thy face, and I was troubled.

verses.name: Psalms 30:8
verses.text: I cried to thee, O Lord; and unto the Lord I made supplication.

verses.name: Psalms 30:9
verses.text: What profit is there in my blood, when I go down to the pit? Shall the dust praise thee? shall it declare thy truth?

verses.name: Psalms 30:10
verses.text: Hear, O Lord, and have mercy upon me: Lord, be thou my helper.

verses.name: Psalms 30:11
verses.text: Thou hast turned for me my mourning into dancing: thou hast put off my sackcloth, and girded me with gladness;

verses.name: Psalms 30:12
verses.text: To the end that my glory may sing praise to thee, and not be silent. O Lord my God, I will give thanks unto thee for ever.
